TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ServiceAuthorizationManager extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供服務作業的授權存取檢查。

span.span: Provides authorization access checking for service operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別會負責評估所有原則 (定義允許使用者執行之作業的規則)、比較原則與用戶端所做的宣告、將結果 設定為 ，以及提供是否允許或拒絕呼叫者存取已指定服務作業的授權決策。This class is responsible for evaluating all policies (rules that define what a user is allowed to do), comparing the policies to claims made by a client, setting the resulting to the , and providing the authorization decision whether to allow or deny access for a given service operation for a caller. 方法呼叫由 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 基礎結構，的每當有人嘗試存取的資源。The method is called by the Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) infrastructure each time an attempt to access a resource is made. 此方法會分別傳回 `true` 或 `false` 以允許或拒絕存取。The method returns `true` or `false` to allow or deny access, respectively. 是 WCF 的一部分*身分識別模型*基礎結構。The is part of the WCF*Identity Model* infrastructure. 「身分識別模型」可讓您建立自訂授權原則和自訂授權配置。The Identity Model enables you to create custom authorization policies and custom authorization schemes. 如需身分識別模型的運作方式的詳細資訊，請參閱[管理宣告與授權身分識別模型](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/managing-claims-and-authorization-with-the-identity-model.md)。For more information about how the Identity Model works, see [Managing Claims and Authorization with the Identity Model](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/managing-claims-and-authorization-with-the-identity-model.md). ## 自訂授權Custom Authorization 這個類別不會執行任何授權，而且會允許使用者存取所有服務作業。This class does not perform any authorization and allows users to access all service operations. 若要提供更嚴格的授權，您必須建立會檢查自訂原則的自訂授權管理員。To provide more restrictive authorization, you must create a custom authorization manager that checks custom policies. 若要這樣做，請繼承自這個類別並覆寫 方法。To do this, inherit from this class and override the method. 請透過 屬性指定該衍生類別的執行個體。Specify the instance of the derived class through the property. 在 中，應用程式可以使用 物件來存取呼叫者身分識別 ()。In , the application can use the object to access the caller identity (). 藉由取得會傳回 物件的 屬性，應用程式便可以存取服務 () 和作業 ()。By getting the property, which returns a object, the application can access the service (), and the operation (). 藉由取得會傳回 物件的 屬性，應用程式便可以存取整個要求訊息 () 並據此執行授權決策。By getting the property, which returns a object, the application can access the entire request message () and perform the authorization decision accordingly. 如需範例，請參閱[How to:建立自訂授權管理員服務](~/docs/framework/wcf/extending/how-to-create-a-custom-authorization-manager-for-a-service.md)。For an example, see [How to: Create a Custom Authorization Manager for a Service](~/docs/framework/wcf/extending/how-to-create-a-custom-authorization-manager-for-a-service.md). 若要建立自訂授權原則，請實作 類別。To create custom authorization policies, implement the class. 如需範例，請參閱[How to:建立自訂授權原則](~/docs/framework/wcf/extending/how-to-create-a-custom-authorization-policy.md)。For an example, see [How to: Create a Custom Authorization Policy](~/docs/framework/wcf/extending/how-to-create-a-custom-authorization-policy.md). 若要建立自訂宣告，請使用 類別。To create a custom claim, use the class. 如需範例，請參閱[How to:建立自訂宣告](~/docs/framework/wcf/extending/how-to-create-a-custom-claim.md)。For an example, see [How to: Create a Custom Claim](~/docs/framework/wcf/extending/how-to-create-a-custom-claim.md). 若要比較自訂宣告，您必須比較宣告，如中所示[How to:比較宣告](~/docs/framework/wcf/extending/how-to-compare-claims.md)。To compare custom claims, you must compare claims, as shown in [How to: Compare Claims](~/docs/framework/wcf/extending/how-to-compare-claims.md). 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 自訂授權](~/docs/framework/wcf/extending/custom-authorization.md)。For more information, see [Custom Authorization](~/docs/framework/wcf/extending/custom-authorization.md). 您可以設定使用自訂授權管理員的型別[ <serviceAuthorization> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/serviceauthorization-element.md)用戶端應用程式組態檔中。You can set the type of a custom authorization manager using the [<serviceAuthorization>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/serviceauthorization-element.md) in a client application configuration file. ## Examples 下列範例會示範名為 `MyServiceAuthorizationManager` 的類別，此類別繼承自 ，而且會覆寫 方法。The following example shows a class named `MyServiceAuthorizationManager` that inherits from the and overrides the method. [!code-csharp[c_CustomAuthMgr#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_customauthmgr/cs/c_customauthmgr.cs#2)] [!code-vb[c_CustomAuthMgr#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_customauthmgr/vb/c_customauthmgr.vb#2)]

The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般而言，應用程式應該會覆寫 ，而不是覆寫這個方法。In general, applications should override instead of this method. 如果應用程式是為結果 與不同一組原則建立關聯或引入不同一組原則，則覆寫 ，否則請提供不同的原則評估 (鏈結) 模型。Override if the application associates or introduces a different set of policies for the resulting or provide a different policy evaluation (chaining) model. 這個方法會負責呼叫 。This method is responsible for calling . ## Examples 下列程式碼將示範如何覆寫這個方法，以強制執行自訂存取控制需求。The following code shows how to override this method to enforce custom access control requirements. [!code-csharp[c_Federation#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_federation/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[c_Federation#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_federation/vb/source.vb#1)]

span.span: The .
The to be examined to determine authorization.

summary.span: 檢查在需要存取訊息時的作業內容授權。

span.span: Checks authorization for the given operation context when access to a message is required.

returns.span: 如果授與存取權，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if access is granted; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般而言，應用程式應該會覆寫 ，而不是覆寫這個方法，而這個方法應該只在授權決策與訊息本文相依時使用。In general, applications should override instead of this method, which should only be used if the authorization decision depends on the message body. 基於效能考量，如果可以，您應該重新設計應用程式，讓授權決策不需要存取訊息本文。Because of performance issues, if possible you should redesign your application so that the authorization decision does not require access to the message body. 如果應用程式是為結果 和 與不同一組原則建立關聯或引入不同一組原則，則覆寫這個方法，否則請提供不同的原則評估 (鏈結) 模型。Override this method if the application associates or introduces a different set of policies for the resulting and or provide a different policy evaluation (chaining) model. 這個方法會負責呼叫 。This method is responsible for calling . ## Examples 下列程式碼將示範如何覆寫這個方法，以強制執行需要存取訊息本文的自訂存取控制需求。The following code shows how to override this method to enforce custom access control requirements that require access to the message body. [!code-csharp[c_Federation#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_federation/cs/source.cs#6)] [!code-vb[c_Federation#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_federation/vb/source.vb#6)]

span.span: The for the current authorization request.

summary.span: 檢查根據預設原則評估所指定作業內容的授權。

span.span: Checks authorization for the given operation context based on default policy evaluation.

returns.span: 如果授與存取權，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if access is granted; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常是預設原則評估產生的結果。 is generally the result from the default policy evaluation. 覆寫這個方法，即可提供自訂授權決策。Override this method to provide custom authorization decisions. 這個方法可用於建立以宣告集為基礎的授權決策，該宣告集的取得方式是依傳入權杖推斷或是透過外部授權原則新增。This method can be used to make authorization decisions based on claim sets that are inferred based on incoming tokens, or added through external authorization policies. 它也可以根據傳入訊息的屬性來建立授權決策，例如動作標頭等屬性。It can also make authorization decisions based on properties of the incoming message: for example, the action header. 使用這個方法時，應用程式可以使用 `operationContext` 參數來存取呼叫者身分識別 ()。In this method, the application can use the `operationContext` parameter to access the caller identity (). 藉由從 屬性傳回 物件，應用程式便可以存取整個要求訊息 ()。By returning the object from the property, the application can access the entire request message (). 藉由從 屬性傳回 物件，應用程式便可以存取服務 URL () 和作業 ()。By returning the object from the property, the application can access the service URL () and the operation (). 使用這份資訊，應用程式便可以據此執行授權決策。With this information, the application can perform the authorization decision accordingly. 使用者所做的宣告會在由 之 屬性所傳回的 `AuthorizationContext` 中找到。The claims made by a user are found in the returned by the property of the `AuthorizationContext`. 目前的 `AuthorizationContext` 是由 類別之 屬性所傳回。The current `AuthorizationContext` is returned by the property of the class. ## Examples 下例範例示範 方法的覆寫。The following example shows an override of the method. [!code-csharp[c_CustomAuthMgr#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_customauthmgr/cs/c_customauthmgr.cs#6)] [!code-vb[c_CustomAuthMgr#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_customauthmgr/vb/c_customauthmgr.vb#6)] 如需其他範例，請參閱[How to:建立自訂授權管理員服務](~/docs/framework/wcf/extending/how-to-create-a-custom-authorization-manager-for-a-service.md)。For another example, see [How to: Create a Custom Authorization Manager for a Service](~/docs/framework/wcf/extending/how-to-create-a-custom-authorization-manager-for-a-service.md).

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection<System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy> GetAuthorizationPolicies (System.ServiceModel.OperationContext operationContext);

.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection`1<class System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy> GetAuthorizationPolicies(class System.ServiceModel.OperationContext operationContext) cil managed

abstract member GetAuthorizationPolicies : System.ServiceModel.OperationContext -> System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection<System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy> override this.GetAuthorizationPolicies : System.ServiceModel.OperationContext -> System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection<System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy>

span.span: The of the current authorization request.

summary.span: 取得參與原則評估的一組原則。

span.span: Gets the set of policies that participate in policy evaluation.
A of type .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 實作提供一組預設的授權原則。The Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) implementation provides a default set of authorization policies. 這些原則包括含有要求者認證的主要權杖，以及所有支援的權杖、傳輸權杖和外部原則 (如果有指定)。These include the primary token that contains the credentials of the requester and all supporting tokens, transport tokens, and external policies if specified. 您可以覆寫這個實作，並提供一組不同的原則。You can override this implementation and provide a different set of policies.
